original_title: Stephen Fulton Jr. vs  Danny Roman
overview: Philadelphia’s unified 122-pound world champion Stephen Fulton Jr. battles Los Angeles’ Danny Roman in a matchup between two of boxing’s most consistently explosive fighters. Plus, the delayed broadcast of five-time world champion Gervonta “Tank” Davis defending his WBA lightweight title against No. 1 ranked contender Rolando “Rollie” Romero at Barclays Center in Brooklyn.
title: Stephen Fulton Jr. vs  Danny Roman
